trans-unit.target: 雨果（扩展版

trans-unit.source: Code Contributions: We actively mark issues that we consider are good first contributions. If you intend to work on a larger contribution to the project, please come talk to us first.
trans-unit.target: 代码贡献：我们积极地标记我们认为是良好的第一贡献的问题。如果您打算为该项目做出更大的贡献，请首先与我们联系。

trans-unit.source: Maintenance: We are incredibly thankful for individuals who are stepping up and helping with maintenance. This includes (but is not limited to) triaging issues, reviewing pull requests and picking up stale ones, helping out other users on StackOverflow, creating minimal, complete and verifiable examples or test cases for existing bug reports, updating documentation, or fixing minor bugs that have recently been reported.
trans-unit.target: 维护：我们非常感谢逐步加强维护的个人。这包括（但不限于）分类问题，审阅拉取请求并获取过时的请求，在StackOverflow上帮助其他用户，为现有的错误报告创建最小，完整和可验证的示例或测试用例，更新文档或修复较小的错误最近有报道。

trans-unit.source: An interactive, SSL/TLS-capable intercepting proxy for HTTP/1, HTTP/2, and WebSockets.
trans-unit.target: 一个交互式的、支持SSL/TLS的HTTP/1、HTTP/2和WebSockets的拦截代理。

trans-unit.source: As an open source project, mitmproxy welcomes contributions of all forms. If you would like to bring the project forward, please consider contributing in the following areas:
trans-unit.target: 作为一个开源项目,mitmproxy欢迎各种形式的贡献。如果您想推动项目的发展,请考虑在以下方面做出贡献。

trans-unit.target: 文件资料

trans-unit.source: For speedier testing, we recommend you run pytest directly on individual test files or folders:
trans-unit.target: 为了加快测试速度，建议您直接在单个测试文件或文件夹上运行pytest：

trans-unit.source: General information, tutorials, and precompiled binaries can be found on the mitmproxy website.
trans-unit.target: 一般信息、教程和预编译的二进制文件可以在mitmproxy网站上找到。

trans-unit.source: If all of this run successfully, do the following:
trans-unit.target: 如果所有这些都成功运行,请执行以下操作。

trans-unit.source: If you have questions on how to use mitmproxy, please ask them on StackOverflow!
trans-unit.target: 如果你有关于如何使用mitmproxy的问题,请在StackOverflow上提问!

trans-unit.source: If you’ve followed the procedure above, you already have all the development requirements installed, and you can run the basic test suite with tox:
trans-unit.target: 如果按照上述步骤进行操作，则已经安装了所有开发要求，并且可以使用tox运行基本测试套件：

trans-unit.source: Installation
trans-unit.target: 安装

trans-unit.source: Join our developer chat on Slack if you would like to contribute to mitmproxy itself.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想为mitmproxy本身做贡献,请加入我们在Slack上的开发者聊天。

trans-unit.source: Keeping to a consistent code style throughout the project makes it easier to contribute and collaborate. Please stick to the guidelines in PEP8 and the Google Style Guide unless there’s a very good reason not to.
trans-unit.target: 在整个项目中保持一致的代码样式，可以更轻松地进行贡献和协作。除非有充分的理由，否则请遵守 PEP8和Google样式指南中的指南。

trans-unit.source: Our CI system has additional tox environments that are run on every pull request and branch on GitHub.
trans-unit.target: 我们的 CI 系统有额外的 tox 环境,这些环境会在 GitHub 上的每个 pull 请求和分支上运行。

trans-unit.source: Please ensure that all patches are accompanied by matching changes in the test suite. The project tries to maintain 100% test coverage and enforces this strictly for some parts of the codebase.
trans-unit.target: 请确保所有的补丁都伴随着测试套件中的相应变化。本项目试图保持100%的测试覆盖率,并对代码库的某些部分严格执行。

trans-unit.source: Pytest does not check the code style, so you want to run
trans-unit.target: Pytest不检查代码风格,所以你要运行的是

trans-unit.source: Testing
trans-unit.target: 测试

trans-unit.source: The dev script will create a virtualenv environment in a directory called “venv” and install all mandatory and optional dependencies into it. The primary mitmproxy components - mitmproxy and pathod - are installed as “editable”, so any changes to the source in the repository will be reflected live in the virtualenv.
trans-unit.target: 在开发脚本将创建一个virtualenv中的一个名为“VENV”目录环境并安装所有必需和可选的依赖关系到它。mitmproxy的主要组件mitmproxy和pathod以“可编辑”的方式安装，因此对存储库中源的任何更改都将实时反映在virtualenv中。

trans-unit.source: The documentation for mitmproxy is available on our website:
trans-unit.target: mitmproxy的文档可以在我们的网站上找到。

trans-unit.target: 构建mitmproxy文档需要以下工具。

trans-unit.source: This is automatically enforced on every PR. If we detect a linting error, the PR checks will fail and block merging. You can run our lint checks yourself with the following commands:
trans-unit.target: 这将在每个PR上自动执行。如果我们检测到一个掉线错误,PR检查将失败并阻止合并。你可以使用以下命令自己运行我们的绒毛检查。

trans-unit.source: This repository contains the mitmproxy and pathod projects.
trans-unit.target: 该存储库包含mitmproxy和pathod项目。
